Package game.view

package game.view
Package of the view classes for connect 4 game. The classes depend on the processing library to create a GUI.

Start the game through the main method in MainServer to play as server or MainClient to play as client.

The view decides how to display the game to the user. The view should never have a reference to the model object or modify the model data directly. Instead, it should communicate the user input to the controller, which handles this input.

Author:
Yohanes Kirana
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Game4GewinnView
    View class that contains all methods and variables that are shared by MainServer and MainClient.
    MainClient
    Class to start the view of client.
    MainServer
    Class for server to start its view.
